help.basics_tab:
üéÆ GAME BASICS

¬´SIBERIA-SOFTWARE¬ª is a cybersecurity work simulator at the company ¬´SIBERIA-SOFT¬ª.

GAME GOAL:

  • Complete daily tasks to advance your career
  • Develop cybersecurity skills
  • Earn money (rubles) and increase reputation
  • Avoid detection by the security system

INTERFACE:

The game interface consists of three main panels:

  • Left panel - employee info, balance, reputation, current task and skills
  • Center panel - terminal for executing commands
  • Right panel - surveillance camera and security system log

GETTING STARTED:

  1. Start a new shift through the main menu
  2. Enter your first and last name during registration
  3. Complete the first task "Check your 'MAIL'"
  4. Use the terminal to complete tasks

help.skills_tab:
üéØ SKILLS SYSTEM

Skills determine your effectiveness in various aspects of work. Skill level from 1 to 10.

SKILL DESCRIPTIONS:

SkillDescriptionHow to Improve
HackingAbility to hack systems, bypass protectionCompleting hacking tasks, using terminal
Social EngineeringAbility to manipulate employees for accessInteracting with NPCs, completing social tasks
ProgrammingCreating scripts, utilities and exploitsWriting code in terminal, solving programming tasks
StealthAbility to avoid detection by security systemCompleting tasks undetected, using hidden commands
AnalysisAbility to analyze data and find vulnerabilitiesAnalyzing logs, researching network packets
Network SecurityKnowledge of network protocols and protection technologiesConfiguring network equipment, protecting systems

SKILL LEVELS:

  • 1-3: Novice - Basic knowledge
  • 4-6: Experienced - Good understanding
  • 7-8: Expert - Professional level
  • 9-10: Master - Highest level of mastery

TIPS:

  • Develop all skills in a balanced way
  • Difficult tasks give more experience
  • Some tasks require minimum skill levels
  • High skill levels unlock new opportunities

cutscene.part1: My name is {player_name}. Since childhood, I've been drawn to the universe of the internet. Due to a family connection with a convicted relative, my career didn't work out: everyone refused me. But one day, returning home in the evening, I noticed a strange leaflet with the logo 'MVD ‚Äì Siberia Soft' at my door. The note invited me to the Ministry of Internal Affairs for the lowest position in the field of monitoring and supervision - in the 'Operative-Search Directorate'. About three years ago, I sent a job application there, and finally got a response. I was incredibly happy even with this position: finally, I wouldn't have to run around for odd jobs for pennies, live in fear every day, my refrigerator wouldn't be filled with instant noodles anymore.
cutscene.part2: Regarding the family connection, my uncle was a man of not the cleanest past, who managed to do a bunch of dishonest things before disappearing without a trace.
cutscene.part3: Actually, disappearances in our country are not rare. One might think this story resembles George Orwell's book '1984', which I liked in childhood, but this is not the case at all. In this country, everything is much more mysterious and complicated. Here there are more guards, more ears and more eyes. Currently, the corporation SIBERIA-SOFTWARE has become the leader in the number of installed cameras throughout the country. Actually, what kind of corporation is this? It replaces the president for us, it's obsessed with control under the guise of providing 'security' for us. I don't argue, thefts and crimes have decreased by an order of magnitude, crime throughout the country has dropped to 5%, but, unfortunately, deaths and murders from this haven't decreased, but on the contrary, have increased several times. All this is related to the permission to reinstate the death penalty in the country. One might ask the logical question: why don't we overthrow it or choose another leader? It's quite simple: SIBERIA-SOFTWARE is a huge corporation that holds the scythe of death and cuts down all dissenters with it. There's simply no one to overthrow it, and the police protect this corporation simply because they're allowed almost everything 'for the good' of the population and country, the main thing is that they don't contradict the authorities.
